      • canCaptureThis

        public boolean canCaptureThis(Board board,
                              Piece target)
        Check if a piece can capture a target by generating its possible moves and Check if target Cell is in range
        Parameters:
        board - the current game board
        target - target piece
        Returns:
        boolean: true if this piece instance in this board can capture target, false otherwise
